      • getTopicIdByIdentifier

                                          String topicId,
                                          BlogManagement blogManagement)
                                   throws BlogNotFoundException,

        Get the topic identifier of alias or id
        Parameters:
        eTopicIdentifierName - enumeration of identifier possibilities
        topicId - identifier alias or topicId
        blogManagement - BlogManagement
        Returns:
        topic identifier
        Throws:
        BlogNotFoundException - topic can not been found by alias
        BlogAccessException - in case the current user has no access to the topic
